Individual freedom is the most important principle and the government should minimize interference in personal life
People should have the right to do anything that does not harm others
Participatory democracy and democratic decision-making are better than centralized government
Absolute freedom of speech should be protected even for opinions that are unpleasant
Laws should be minimized and only to prevent harm to others
Every individual should have complete freedom to choose their own lifestyle
Cultural diversity and pluralism should be respected and supported
Government surveillance of citizens violates privacy and freedom
